Class Helper

java.lang.Object
de.hshn.mi.pdbg.basicservice.gui.reusables.Helper
public class Helper extends Object
This class is containing some static convenience methods.
Author:
Simon Pezold

  • Method Details

    • toString

      public static String toString(Date date)
      Parameters:
      date - The date to format.
      Returns:
      A String representation of the given Date in the DateFormat.SHORT form of the current locale. An empty String if the given Date is null.

    • toString

      public static String toString(Ward ward)
      Parameters:
      ward - The Ward to format.
      Returns:
      A String containing the name of the given Ward and, if it is persistent, also its ID. An empty String if the given Ward is null.

    • convertDateToDateTime

      public static void convertDateToDateTime(Date source, org.eclipse.swt.widgets.DateTime target)
      Taking the given Date as source for a date and setting the given DateTime to the same value.
      Parameters:
      source - must not be null
      target - must not be null
      Throws:
      AssertionError - if one of the given parameters is invalid

    • convertDateTimeToDate

      public static Date convertDateTimeToDate(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.DateTime source)
      Taking the given DateTime as source for a date and returning a Date with the same value.
      Parameters:
      source - must not be null
      Returns:
      a new Date object with the same value
      Throws:
      AssertionError - if one of the given parameters is invalid

    • compare

      public static int compare(String string1, String string2)
      Replacing null Strings with empty Strings ("") in order to avoid checking every String whether it is null or not. Uses the usual String.compareToIgnoreCase(String) method.
      Parameters:
      string1 - The reference string object.
      string2 - The string object for comparison.
      Returns:
      The result of the usual String.compareToIgnoreCase(String) method.

    • compare

      public static int compare(Date date1, Date date2)
      Replacing null Dates with the current Date in order to avoid checking every Date whether it is null or not. Uses the usual Date.compareTo(Date) method.
      Parameters:
      date1 - The reference Date object.
      date2 - The Date object for comparison.
      Returns:
      The result of the usual Date.compareTo(Date) method.

    • getHospitalStay

      public static HospitalStay getHospitalStay(BasicDBService service, long patientID, long hospitalStayID)
      Simulating a missing service method of the form BasicDBService.getHospitalStays(long). Note: The method is not very fast as it iterates over all HospitalStays of the given patient in order to find the right one. Should be replaced by a native service method.
      Parameters:
      service - must not be null
      patientID - The identifier (objectID) of the associated Patient of the HospitalStay to be returned. It must be greater than zero (0). It must not be PersistentObject.INVALID_OBJECT_ID
      hospitalStayID - The identifier (objectID) of the object to be returned. It must be greater than zero (0). It must not be PersistentObject.INVALID_OBJECT_ID
      Returns:
      The HospitalStay object or null, if none was found with the given ID.
      Throws:
      FetchException - Thrown if an error occurred while fetching an object.
      AssertionError - Thrown if a given parameter value is invalid.
